schema.name: Condo Dinner

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by dicing the sausage into bite-sized pieces.
Peel and slice the kiwi into thin rounds.
Prepare the Vegetable Chopseuy by washing and cutting the vegetables into small chunks.
In a skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Once melted, add the diced sausage pieces and sauté for about 5 minutes until they are nicely browned.
Crack the eggs into a bowl, add the cream cheese, and whisk together until the mixture is smooth.
Pour the egg mixture over the sautéed sausage in the skillet. Cook for about 4 minutes, gently scrambling the eggs with a spatula until they are just set.
Lastly, stir in the Vegetable Chopseuy into the skillet and cook for an additional 3 minutes, until the vegetables are heated through but still crisp.
Serve the scramble on a plate and garnish with the fresh kiwi slices on the side.

schema.description: This Condo Dinner recipe is perfect for those seeking a healthy yet satisfying meal. Packed with high-protein, low-carb ingredients, it's designed to fit into a health-conscious diet without sacrificing flavor. Featuring eggs, butter, cream cheese, sausage, kiwi, and a delightful mix of vegetables, it's a delightful way to enjoy a nutritious dinner that’s also high in sodium for those who need it.
